channel.title: Buying private server :D
channel.description:
Ok im buying a private server here is what i want in it and also I am a newb to this stuff so i will probley need step by step instructions after :D We will discuss about the price on my msn add it its alex_b_9_9@hotmail.com
What I am offering is well over 10 mill in stuff :D
this project will be sorta hard (a friend coder said) so it will probley take a bit of time it will be a pking server called "pkingscape" I have allready made my no-ip registerations ect... so anyway here is what i want
-I would like pkingscape to be ONLY varrock and the wilderness Please if u can take it off the map (black area) or put a fence arround it all and disable all other teles
-Go very detaled on monsters in wilderness
-Normal runescape attacking(speed)
-Normal rs stats (weapions,armor,skills ect...)
-Make training zone for each each type of class your going to be (ranger,no mage,melee) codes will be to get teled there for melee "::melee" Ranger "::ranger" ect...
-Stats will be times 8 then normal rs (say if rs had 1 xp per attack well in my server will have 8 xp per attack)
-Cut out mages from the server there will be no mages :D
-There will be dragon Weapions but no dragon armor and no dragon specials
-also no ranger specials
-There will be no teleing!
-Ok now for the shops there will be 3 shop sellers at the fountion in varrock heres what they will be and there prices
-Scimmy shop (Alex Burke)-
bronze scimmy - 20gp -Iron scimmy-30gp -Steel scimmy-40gp -Mith scimmy-100gp -addy scimmy-300gp -Rune scimmy-700gp
-Archer shop (terry burke)
-bronze arrow-1gp -iron arrow-2gp -steel arrow 4gp -addy arrow-10gp
- bows (short bows only) -bow 1gp -oak 3gp -willow 5gp -yew 7gp -magic-11gp
- FOOD SHOP -
salmon-3gp tuna-5gp lobbster-8gp
And thats about it for shops and now on to making money
-Everyone will start out with 1 woodcutting axe (bronze) and 500gp
Ok heres a picture ok what I am going to explane what i want over here
http://www.click2host.us/006/trees.bmp
[img]http://www.click2host.us/006/trees.bmp[/img]
Ok well the blue line is where the world cuts off but all inside there and beside east bank i want u to mass lots of woodcutting trees (normal,willow,yew,magic) and the red little dot is where the shop called
(Wood buyer)-You can only sell wood there here are prices
-normal logs-8gp-(lvl 1 wc) -willow-12gp-(lvl 20) -yew-53gp- (lvl 35) -Magic-73gp-(lvl 50)
-You will Get woodcutting 9 times as fast as in runescape
-There will be no Member part in wild just up to non memebers Gate ty :D
ALSO FOR THE CODER THAT MAKES THIS HAS A OPTION OF BEING A ADMIN AND THE SERVER CODER IF THEY LIKE.
So remember my e-mail is alex_b_9_9@hotmail.com please contact me :D

item.title: Buying private server :D
item.dc:creator: @kingjibs96 kingjibs96
item.description:
@kingjibs96 wrote:

dont buy a server just make one
download testscape source
get jdk
get the ultimate compiler if you want it and i think it should help more
search for intructions of making a server
then follow them carfully
and in 30 minutes you should have your server
then if you feel good about yourself and you are sure
that you can make another server or add another source to your server try it
beacuse your getting ripped off if you buy servers wich are very easy to get
and also what if:
()the server crashes and you dont know what to do
()the server you bought has a virus
()you gave them the money but they didnt give you the server

think of the advantages of making your own server and i bet you will be able to do it.
--GOOD LUCK--

Read full topic
